trans-unit.source: Member functions are called with dot notation:
trans-unit.target: 成员函数用点符号调用。

trans-unit.source: Member functions define operations that are essential for a collection type. For example, Collection contains the function isEmpty() for checking its emptiness; List contains get() for index access to elements, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 成员函数定义对于集合类型必不可少的操作。例如， Collection 包含函数 isEmpty() 来检查其空度； List 包含用于对元素进行索引访问的 get() ，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Member properties and member functions inside a generic class may for the most part use the class' generic type parameters as if they were ordinary types, without having to redeclare them. It is also possible to make functions that take more generic parameters than the class does, and to make generic functions inside nongeneric classes, and to make generic top-level functions (which is what we'll do in the next example). Note the different placement of the generic type parameter in generic function declarations:
trans-unit.target: 通用类内部的成员属性和成员函数在大多数情况下可以像使用普通类型一样使用类的通用类型参数,而不必重新声明它们。也可以制作比类更多的泛型参数的函数,也可以在非泛型类内部制作泛型函数,还可以制作泛型顶层函数(这就是我们在下一个例子中要做的)。注意通用函数声明中通用类型参数的位置不同。

trans-unit.source: Methods that follow the Java conventions for getters and setters (no-argument methods with names starting with get and single-argument methods with names starting with set) are represented as properties in Kotlin. Boolean accessor methods (where the name of the getter starts with is and the name of the setter starts with set) are represented as properties which have the same name as the getter method.
trans-unit.target: 遵循Java的getter和setter约定的方法（名称以 get 开头的无参数方法和名称以 set 开头的单参数方法）在Kotlin中表示为属性。 Boolean 访问器方法（getter的名称以 is 开头，setter的名称以 set 开头）表示为与getter方法具有相同名称的属性。

trans-unit.source: Mutual exclusion
trans-unit.target: 相互排斥

trans-unit.source: Mutual exclusion solution to the problem is to protect all modifications of the shared state with a critical section that is never executed concurrently. In a blocking world you'd typically use synchronized or ReentrantLock for that. Coroutine's alternative is called Mutex. It has lock and unlock functions to delimit a critical section. The key difference is that Mutex.lock() is a suspending function. It does not block a thread.
trans-unit.target: 解决该问题的互斥解决方案是使用永远不会同时执行的关键部分来保护共享状态的所有修改。在阻止世界你通常使用 synchronized 或 ReentrantLock 的了点。协程的替代品称为Mutex。它具有锁定和解锁功能来界定关键部分。关键区别在于 Mutex.lock() 是一个暂停函数。它不会阻塞线程。

trans-unit.source: Names in links are resolved using the same rules as if the name was used inside the element being documented. In particular, this means that if you have imported a name into the current file, you don't need to fully qualify it when you use it in a KDoc comment.
trans-unit.target: 链接中的名称的解析规则与该名称在被记录的元素中使用的规则相同。特别是,这意味着如果你已经将一个名字导入到当前文件中,当你在KDoc注释中使用它时,你不需要对它进行完全限定。

trans-unit.source: Names of classes and objects start with an upper case letter and use camel humps:
trans-unit.target: 类和对象的名称以大写字母开头,使用驼峰。

trans-unit.source: Names of constants (properties marked with const, or top-level or object val properties with no custom get function that hold deeply immutable data) should use uppercase underscore-separated names:
trans-unit.target: 常量名称（用 const 标记的属性，或没有自定义 get 函数的顶级或对象 val 属性，这些属性不保存深度​​不可变的数据）应使用大写的下划线分隔名称：

trans-unit.source: Names of functions, properties and local variables start with a lower case letter and use camel humps and no underscores:
trans-unit.target: 函数、属性和局部变量的名称以小写字母开头,使用驼峰,不使用下划线。

trans-unit.source: Names of packages are always lower case and do not use underscores (org.example.myproject). Using multi-word names is generally discouraged, but if you do need to use multiple words, you can either simply concatenate them together or use camel humps (org.example.myProject).
trans-unit.target: 软件包名称始终为小写，并且不使用下划线（ org.example.myproject ）。通常不建议使用多个单词的名称，但是如果您确实需要使用多个单词，则可以将它们简单地串联在一起，也可以使用驼峰（ org.example.myProject ）。

trans-unit.source: Names of properties holding references to singleton objects can use the same naming style as object declarations:
trans-unit.target: 持有对单例对象的引用的属性名称可以使用与 object 声明相同的命名方式：

trans-unit.source: Names of top-level or object properties which hold objects with behavior or mutable data should use regular camel-hump names:
trans-unit.target: 持有具有行为或可变数据的对象的顶层或对象属性的名称应使用常规的驼峰名称。

trans-unit.source: No locks are used to synchronize an access to the Lazy instance value; if the instance is accessed from multiple threads, its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 不使用锁来同步对Lazy实例值的访问。如果从多个线程访问该实例，则其行为是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: No need to mark the Application class as open since we are using the kotlin-spring Gradle plugin which does that automatically.
trans-unit.target: 无需将Application类标记为已打开，因为我们使用的是自动完成功能的kotlin-spring Gradle插件。

trans-unit.source: Normal functions (not marked as inline) cannot have reified parameters. A type that does not have a run-time representation (e.g. a non-reified type parameter or a fictitious type like Nothing) cannot be used as an argument for a reified type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 普通功能（未标记为内联）不能具有统一的参数。没有运行时表示形式的类型（例如，未归类的类型参数或虚构的类型，如 Nothing ）不能用作归一化类型参数的参数。

trans-unit.source: Normal methods can be overridden using the override Kotlin keyword. In this case the overriding method must have the same parameter names as the overridden one.
trans-unit.target: 普通方法可以使用 override Kotlin关键字来覆盖。在这种情况下，覆盖方法必须具有与被覆盖方法相同的参数名称。

trans-unit.source: Normally, if you write a Kotlin function with default parameter values, it will be visible in Java only as a full signature, with all parameters present. If you wish to expose multiple overloads to Java callers, you can use the @JvmOverloads annotation.
trans-unit.target: 通常，如果您使用默认参数值编写Kotlin函数，则该函数在Java中仅作为具有所有参数存在的完整签名可见。如果希望向Java调用者公开多个重载，则可以使用 @JvmOverloads 批注。

trans-unit.source: Normally, properties declared as having a non-null type must be initialized in the constructor. However, fairly often this is not convenient. For example, properties can be initialized through dependency injection, or in the setup method of a unit test. In this case, you cannot supply a non-null initializer in the constructor, but you still want to avoid null checks when referencing the property inside the body of a class.
trans-unit.target: 通常,声明为非空类型的属性必须在构造函数中初始化。然而,这并不方便。例如,属性可以通过依赖注入或在单元测试的setup方法中进行初始化。在这种情况下,你不能在构造函数中提供一个非空的初始化器,但你仍然希望在类的主体中引用属性时避免空检查。

trans-unit.source: Not only classes can have type parameters. Functions can, too. Type parameters are placed before the name of the function:
trans-unit.target: 不仅类可以具有类型参数。功能也可以。类型参数放置在函数名称之前：

trans-unit.source: Not use any members that take a star-projected type as a parameter
trans-unit.target: 不使用任何以星形投影类型为参数的成员。

trans-unit.source: Not-null assertion operator
trans-unit.target: 非空断言运算符

trans-unit.source: NotImplementedError
trans-unit.target: NotImplementedError

trans-unit.source: Notation for Platform Types
trans-unit.target: 平台类型的符号

trans-unit.source: Note how the lateinit modifier allows to declare a non-null type initialized after the object is created (after the constructor call). Without lateinit you'd have to declare a nullable type and add additional nullability checks.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，lateinit修饰符如何允许声明在创建对象后（构造函数调用之后）初始化的非null类型。如果没有 lateinit ，则必须声明可为空的类型并添加其他可为空性检查。

trans-unit.source: Note how easily one may forget the corresponding context element and then still safely access thread local. To avoid such situations, it is recommended to use ensurePresent method and fail-fast on improper usages.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，忘记相应的上下文元素然后仍然安全地访问本地线程是多么容易。为避免此类情况，建议使用surePresent方法，并在使用不当时进行快速失败。

trans-unit.source: Note on visibility
trans-unit.target: 关于能见度的说明

trans-unit.source: Note that Kotlin Android Extensions plugin (automatically bundled into the Kotlin plugin in Android Studio) solves the same issue: replacing findViewById with a concise and straightforward code. Consider using it unless you're already using ButterKnife and don't want to migrate.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Kotlin Android扩展插件（自动捆绑到Android Studio中的Kotlin插件中）解决了相同的问题：用简洁明了的代码替换 findViewById 。考虑使用它，除非您已经在使用ButterKnife并且不想迁移。

trans-unit.source: Note that onReceiveOrNull is an extension function defined only for channels with non-nullable elements so that there is no accidental confusion between a closed channel and a null value.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，onReceiveOrNull是仅为具有不可为null的元素的通道定义的扩展函数，因此在关闭的通道和null值之间不会出现意外的混淆。

trans-unit.source: Note that ticker is aware of possible consumer pauses and, by default, adjusts next produced element delay if a pause occurs, trying to maintain a fixed rate of produced elements.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，行情自动收录器会注意可能的使用者停顿，并且默认情况下会在发生停顿时调整下一个生产要素延迟，以尝试维持固定的生产要素比率。

trans-unit.source: Note that isActive in CoroutineScope is just a convenient shortcut for coroutineContext[Job]?.isActive == true.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是isActive在CoroutineScope仅仅是一个方便的快捷 coroutineContext[Job]?.isActive == true 。

trans-unit.source: Note that - is an invalid symbol in Java, meaning that it's impossible to call functions which accept inline classes from Java.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， - 是Java中的无效符号，这意味着无法调用接受Java中内联类的函数。

trans-unit.source: Note that associate() produces short-living Pair objects which may affect the performance. Thus, associate() should be used when the performance isn't critical or it's more preferable than other options.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， associate() 会生成短暂的 Pair 对象，这可能会影响性能。因此，当性能不是很关键或比其他选项更可取时，应使用 associate() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that external modifier is inherited by nested declarations, i.e. in Node class we do not put external before member functions and properties.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是 external 改性剂由嵌套的声明，即在继承了 Node 类我们不把 external 前成员的功能和属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that jQuery needs to be included in the corresponding HTML:
trans-unit.target: 注意， jQuery 需要包含在相应的HTML中：

trans-unit.source: Note that null cannot be cast to String as this type is not nullable, i.e. if y is null, the code above throws an exception. In order to match Java cast semantics we have to have nullable type at cast right hand side, like:
trans-unit.target: 注意，不能将null强制转换为 String ,因为此类型不可为null，即，如果 y 为null，则上面的代码将引发异常。为了匹配Java Cast语义，我们必须在Cast右侧具有可为null的类型，例如：

trans-unit.source: Note that KDoc does not have any syntax for resolving overloaded members in links. Since the Kotlin documentation generation tool puts the documentation for all overloads of a function on the same page, identifying a specific overloaded function is not required for the link to work.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,KDoc没有任何语法来解析链接中的重载成员。由于 Kotlin 文档生成工具将一个函数的所有重载的文档放在同一页上,所以不需要识别一个特定的重载函数,链接就可以使用。

trans-unit.source: Note that Kapt does not support multiple rounds for the generated Kotlin files.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,Kapt不支持多轮生成的Kotlin文件。

trans-unit.source: Note that Kotlin compiler does not apply such mangling to external declarations, so you don't have to use @JsName on them. Another case worth noticing is inheriting non-external classes from external classes. In this case any overridden functions won't be mangled as well.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Kotlin编译器不会将此类处理应用于 external 声明，因此您不必在其上使用 @JsName 。另一个值得注意的情况是从外部类继承非外部类。在这种情况下，任何覆盖的函数也不会被破坏。

trans-unit.source: Note that Kotlin does not have a new keyword.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Kotlin没有新关键字。

trans-unit.source: Note that SAM conversions only work for interfaces, not for abstract classes, even if those also have just a single abstract method.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,SAM转换只适用于接口,而不适用于抽象类,即使这些抽象类也只有一个抽象方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that a for loop always implicitly declares a new read-only variable (in this example, name) - if the outer scope already contains a variable with the same name, it will be shadowed by the unrelated loop variable. For the same reason, the final value of the loop variable is not accessible after the loop.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， for 循环始终隐式声明一个新的只读变量（在此示例中为 name ）-如果外部作用域已经包含一个具有相同名称的变量，则该变量将被不相关的循环变量遮盖。出于同样的原因，循环变量的最终值在循环后不可访问。

trans-unit.source: Note that a Kotlin class reference is not the same as a Java class reference. To obtain a Java class reference, use the .java property on a KClass instance.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Kotlin类引用与Java类引用不同。要获取Java类引用，请在 KClass 实例上使用 .java 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that a boxed primitive type used as a type parameter is mapped to a platform type: for example, List<java.lang.Integer> becomes a List<Int!> in Kotlin.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将用作类型参数的装箱原始类型映射到平台类型：例如， List<java.lang.Integer> List<Int!> 在Kotlin中成为List <Int！>。

trans-unit.source: Note that a file marked with the @JsQualifier(...) annotation can't contain non-external declarations.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，标有 @JsQualifier(...) 批注的文件不能包含非 external 声明。

trans-unit.source: Note that a function type with no receiver is inferred by default, even if a variable is initialized with a reference to an extension function. To alter that, specify the variable type explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,默认情况下,即使一个变量是通过引用扩展函数来初始化的,也会推断出一个没有接收器的函数类型。要改变这种情况,请明确地指定变量类型。

trans-unit.source: Note that a module referenced by a dependency declared for commonMain or commonTest source set must be published using the kotlin-multiplatform plugin. If you want to use libraries published by the kotlin-platform-native plugin, you need to declare a separate source set for common native sources.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，必须使用 kotlin-multiplatform 插件发布由为 commonMain 或 commonTest 源集声明的依赖项引用的模块。如果要使用由 kotlin-platform-native 插件发布的库，则需要为常见的本地源声明一个单独的源集。

trans-unit.source: Note that a read-only variable is not a constant per se: it can be initialized with the value of a variable (so its value doesn't need to be known at compile-time), and if it is declared inside a construct that is repeatedly invoked (such as a function or a loop), it can take on a different value on each invocation. Also, while the read-only variable may not be reassigned while it is in scope, it can still refer to an object which is in itself mutable (such as a list).
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,只读变量本身并不是一个常量:它可以用一个变量的值来初始化(所以它的值不需要在编译时就知道),如果它被声明在一个被反复调用的构造中(比如一个函数或一个循环),那么它可以在每次调用时取一个不同的值。另外,虽然只读变量在作用域内时可能不会被重新分配,但它仍然可以引用一个本身是可变的对象(如列表)。

trans-unit.source: Note that all classes in this tutorial are in the org.jetbrains.kotlin.demo package.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，本教程中的所有类都在 org.jetbrains.kotlin.demo 包中。

trans-unit.source: Note that altering a mutable collection doesn't require it to be a var: write operations modify the same mutable collection object, so the reference doesn't change. Although, if you try to reassign a val collection, you'll get a compilation error.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，更改可变集合并不需要将其更改为 var ：写操作会修改同一可变集合对象，因此引用不会更改。但是，如果尝试重新分配 val 集合，则会收到编译错误。

trans-unit.source: Note that an actor coroutine builder is a dual of produce coroutine builder. An actor is associated with the channel that it receives messages from, while a producer is associated with the channel that it sends elements to.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，演员协程构建器是生产协程构建器的对偶。参与者与它从中接收消息的通道相关联，而生产者与它向其发送元素的通道相关联。

trans-unit.source: Note that an order of comparator is reversed by this wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此包装程序颠倒了比较器的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Note that anonymous function parameters are always passed inside the parentheses. The shorthand syntax allowing to leave the function outside the parentheses works only for lambda expressions.
trans-unit.target: 注意,匿名函数参数总是在括号内传递。允许将函数留在括号外的速记语法只适用于lambda表达式。

trans-unit.source: Note that anonymous objects can be used as types only in local and private declarations. If you use an anonymous object as a return type of a public function or the type of a public property, the actual type of that function or property will be the declared supertype of the anonymous object, or Any if you didn't declare any supertype. Members added in the anonymous object will not be accessible.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，匿名对象只能在本地和私有声明中用作类型。如果您使用匿名对象作为公共函数的返回类型或公共属性的类型，则该函数或属性的实际类型将是匿名对象的声明的超类型，或者如果您未声明任何超类型，则为 Any 。添加到匿名对象中的成员将不可访问。

trans-unit.source: Note that another regular expression constructed from the same pattern string may have different options and may match strings differently.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，从同一模式字符串构造的另一个正则表达式可能具有不同的选项，并且可能以不同的方式匹配字符串。

trans-unit.source: Note that blank lines do not affect the detected indent level.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,空行不影响检测到的缩进水平。

trans-unit.source: Note that both the target platform and the name matter: if a target was created as jvm('jvm6'), using jvm() will create a separate target (with the default name jvm). If the preset function used to create the target under that name was different, an error is reported.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，目标平台和名称都很重要：如果将目标创建为 jvm('jvm6') ，则使用 jvm() 将创建一个单独的目标（默认名称为 jvm ）。如果用于创建该名称下的目标的预设功能不同，则会报告错误。

trans-unit.source: Note that boxing of numbers does not necessarily preserve identity:
trans-unit.target: 请注意,数字的方框不一定能保持身份。

trans-unit.source: Note that cancelling a producer coroutine closes its channel, thus eventually terminating iteration over the channel that processor coroutines are doing.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,取消一个生产者coroutine会关闭它的通道,从而最终终止在处理器coroutine正在做的通道上的迭代。

trans-unit.source: Note that changing type from unsigned type to signed counterpart (and vice versa) is a binary incompatible change
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将类型从无符号类型更改为带符号的对应类型（反之亦然）是二进制不兼容的更改

trans-unit.source: Note that characters are not numbers in Kotlin.
trans-unit.target: 注意,在Kotlin中,字符不是数字。

trans-unit.source: Note that classes which extend subclasses of a sealed class (indirect inheritors) can be placed anywhere, not necessarily in the same file.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,扩展密封类的子类(间接继承者)的类可以放在任何地方,不一定要放在同一个文件中。

trans-unit.source: Note that code in initializer blocks effectively becomes part of the primary constructor. Delegation to the primary constructor happens as the first statement of a secondary constructor, so the code in all initializer blocks is executed before the secondary constructor body. Even if the class has no primary constructor, the delegation still happens implicitly, and the initializer blocks are still executed:
trans-unit.target: 请注意,初始化块中的代码实际上成为主构造函数的一部分。委托给主构造函数的行为发生在辅助构造函数的第一条语句中,所以所有初始化块中的代码在辅助构造函数主体之前被执行。即使类中没有主构造函数,委托仍然隐式发生,初始化块仍然会被执行。

trans-unit.source: Note that coroutines are currently considered an experimental feature, meaning that the Kotlin team is not committing to supporting the backwards compatibility of this feature after the final 1.1 release.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，协程目前被视为实验性功能，这意味着Kotlin团队在最终的1.1版本之后不再致力于支持该功能的向后兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Note that despite the fact that the right-hand side of as? is a non-null type String the result of the cast is nullable.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，尽管事实如此？是非null类型的 String 强制转换的结果为可为空。

trans-unit.source: Note that even if isMarkedNullable is false, values of the type can still be null. This may happen if it is a type of the type parameter with a nullable upper bound:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，即使isMarkedNullable为false，该类型的值仍可以为 null 。如果它是类型参数的类型且具有可为空的上限，则可能会发生这种情况：

trans-unit.source: Note that even if you initialize a variable with a reference to an extension function, the inferred function type will have no receiver (it will have an additional parameter accepting a receiver object). To have a function type with receiver instead, specify the type explicitly:
trans-unit.target: 请注意,即使你用一个扩展函数的引用来初始化一个变量,推断出的函数类型将没有接收器(它将有一个接受接收器对象的附加参数)。如果要拥有一个带有接收器的函数类型,请明确地指定类型。

trans-unit.source: Note that even though this is a read-only property due to declaring it with val (in which case you may not provide a setter), its value can still change since it reads from a mutable property - you just can't assign to the property. Also, note that the property type is inferred from the return value of the getter.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，尽管由于使用 val 声明了它是一个只读属性（在这种情况下，您可能没有提供设置器），但它的值仍然可以更改，因为它是从可变属性中读取的-您无法将其分配给属性。另外，请注意，从getter的返回值推断出属性类型。

trans-unit.source: Note that exceptions are somewhat discouraged in Kotlin except when interacting with Java code. Instead of throwing exceptions in your own code, consider using special return types like Option or Either from the Arrow library.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，除了与Java代码进行交互时，在Kotlin中不建议使用异常。可以考虑使用特殊的返回类型，例如Option或Arrow库中的Either，而不是在自己的代码中引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Note that expected declarations are not restricted to interfaces and interface members. In this example, the expected class has a constructor and can be created directly from common code. You can apply the expect modifier to other declarations as well, including top-level declarations and annotations:

trans-unit.source: Note that extensions can be defined with a nullable receiver type. Such extensions can be called on an object variable even if its value is null, and can check for this == null inside the body. This is what allows you to call toString() in Kotlin without checking for null: the check happens inside the extension function.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以使用可为空的接收器类型定义扩展。即使对象变量的值为null，也可以在对象变量上调用此类扩展，并且可以在主体内检查 this == null 。这就是您可以在Kotlin中调用toString（）而无需检查是否为null的情况：检查是在扩展函数内部进行的。

trans-unit.source: Note that for a top level extension property, the delegate is the same for all extension receivers, so the actual receiver instance passed in is not going to make any difference, it must only be a value of T.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于顶级扩展属性，所有扩展接收者的委托都是相同的，因此传入的实际接收者实例不会有任何区别，它只能是T的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that for the IDE to correctly analyze the dependencies of the common sources, the common source sets need to have corresponding dependencies on the Kotlin metadata packages in addition to the platform-specific artifact dependencies of the platform-specific source sets. Usually, an artifact with a suffix -common (as in kotlin-stdlib-common) or -metadata is required when using a published library (unless it is published with Gradle metadata, as described below).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，为了使IDE能够正确分析公共源的依赖关系，除了特定于平台的源集的特定于平台的工件依赖关系之外，公共源集还必须具有对应于Kotlin元数据包的依赖关系。通常，在使用已发布的库时（除非它与Gradle元数据一起发布，如下所述），需要后缀为 -common （如 kotlin-stdlib-common ）或 -metadata 的工件。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a library consumer defines variants that are missing in the library, they need to provide matching fallbacks. For example, if a library does not have or does not publish a staging build type, it will be necessary to provide a fallback for the consumers who have such a build type, specifying at least one of the build types that the library publishes:

trans-unit.source: Note that if an inline function has no inlinable function parameters and no reified type parameters, the compiler will issue a warning, since inlining such functions is very unlikely to be beneficial (you can suppress the warning if you are sure the inlining is needed using the annotation @Suppress("NOTHING_TO_INLINE")).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果内联函数没有可插入函数参数且没有类型化参数，则编译器将发出警告，因为内联此类函数不太可能是有益的（如果可以确定使用此内联函数，则可以取消该警告。注释 @Suppress("NOTHING_TO_INLINE") ）。

trans-unit.source: Note that if an interface with @JvmDefault methods is used as a delegate, the default method implementations are called even if the actual delegate type provides its own implementations.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果将具有 @JvmDefault 方法的接口用作委托，则即使实际的委托类型提供了自己的实现，也会调用默认方法实现。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the comparator considers any two keys of this map equal, only the value associated with the last of them gets into the resulting map.
trans-unit.target: 注意，如果 comparator 认为此映射的任何两个键相等，则只有与它们最后一个键关联的值才进入结果映射。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the natural sorting order of keys considers any two keys of this map equal (this could happen if the equality of keys according to Comparable.compareTo is inconsistent with the equality according to Any.equals), only the value associated with the last of them gets into the resulting map.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果键的自然排序顺序认为此映射的任何两个键相等（如果根据Comparable.compareTo的键的相等性与根据Any.equals的相等性不一致，则可能发生这种情况）他们进入结果地图。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the type of the result is known from the context, the type argument can be omitted as usual due to the type inference.

trans-unit.source: Note that if this function fails, then partial copying may have taken place.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果该函数失败,那么可能已经进行了部分复制。

trans-unit.source: Note that if we have called await in println and omitted start on individual coroutines, then we would have got the sequential behaviour as await starts the coroutine execution and waits for the execution to finish, which is not the intended use-case for laziness. The use-case for async(start = CoroutineStart.LAZY) is a replacement for the standard lazy function in cases when computation of the value involves suspending functions.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果我们在 println 中调用了await并且在各个协程上省略了start，那么当await启动协程执行并等待执行完成时，我们将获得顺序行为，这不是懒惰的预期用例。在值的计算涉及暂停​​函数的情况下， async(start = CoroutineStart.LAZY) 的用例代替了标准 lazy 函数。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you are using multi-project build, you should apply plugin to the main project that is an entry point to your application.

trans-unit.source: Note that if your function has parameters, its name will be mangled, so the mangled name should be used in the keep directive.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果你的函数有参数,它的名字会被打乱,所以在keep指令中应该使用打乱的名字。

trans-unit.source: Note that in Kotlin/JS Float range is wider than "single format" bit layout can represent, so some Float values may overflow, underflow or loose their accuracy after conversion to bits and back.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,在Kotlin/JS中,Float的范围比 "单一格式 "的位布局所能代表的范围更宽,所以有些Float值在转换为位后再返回时,可能会溢出、少溢或失去精度。

trans-unit.source: Note that in competitive programming it is customary to give variables shorter names than it is typical in industrial programming practice, since the code is to be written just once and not supported thereafter. However, these names are usually still mnemonic — a for arrays, i, j, etc for indices, r, and c for row and column numbers in tables, x and y for coordinates, etc. It is easier to keep the same names for input data as it is given in the problem statement. However, more complex problems require more code which leads to using longer self-explanatory variable and function names.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在竞争性编程中，通常给变量起一个比工业编程实践中所用的名称更短的名称，这是因为该代码仅被编写一次，此后不被支持。然而，这些名字都是平时还是记忆- a 数组， i ， j 等为指标， r ，和 c 为在表中，行数和列数 x 和 y 为坐标等更容易保持相同的名字输入问题陈述中给出的数据。但是，更复杂的问题需要更多代码，从而导致使用更长的不言自明的变量和函数名称。

trans-unit.source: Note that in many cases there's no need to use custom interoperability library creation mechanisms described below, as for APIs available on the platform standardized bindings called platform libraries could be used. For example, POSIX on Linux/macOS platforms, Win32 on Windows platform, or Apple frameworks on macOS/iOS are available this way.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在许多情况下，不需要使用下面描述的自定义互操作性库创建机制，因为可以使用平台上可用的API，可以使用称为平台库的标准化绑定。例如，以这种方式可以使用Linux / macOS平台上的POSIX，Windows平台上的Win32或macOS / iOS上的Apple框架。

trans-unit.source: Note that in most cases using string templates or raw strings is preferable to string concatenation.

trans-unit.target: 请注意，中缀函数始终都需要同时指定接收方和参数。当您使用后缀符号在当前接收方上调用方法时，您需要显式使用 this 。与常规方法调用不同，它不能被忽略。这是确保明确解析所必需的。

trans-unit.source: Note that the type of a property must be explicitly specified. As opposed to Python, declaring a property directly inside the class does not create a class-level property, but an instance-level one: every instance of Person will have its ownname and age. Their values will start out in every instance as "Anne" and 32, respectively, but the value in each instance can be modified independently of the others:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，必须明确指定属性的类型。与Python相反，在类内部直接声明属性不会创建类级别的属性，而是创建实例级别的属性： Person 的每个实例都有其自己的 name 和 age 。它们的值将在每个实例中分别以 "Anne" 和 32 开头，但是每个实例中的值可以独立于其他实例进行修改：

trans-unit.source: Note that you can build the same pipeline using iterator coroutine builder from the standard library. Replace produce with iterator, send with yield, receive with next, ReceiveChannel with Iterator, and get rid of the coroutine scope. You will not need runBlocking either. However, the benefit of a pipeline that uses channels as shown above is that it can actually use multiple CPU cores if you run it in Dispatchers.Default context.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您可以使用标准库中的 iterator 协程生成器来构建相同的管道。将 produce 替换为 iterator ，使用 yield send ，使用 next receive ，使用 Iterator 接收 ReceiveChannel ，并摆脱协程范围。您也不需要 runBlocking 。但是，使用如上所述通道的管道的好处是，如果在Dispatchers.Default上下文中运行它，则它实际上可以使用多个CPU内核。

trans-unit.source: Note the use of Kotlin's null-assertion operator!! after the readLine() function call. Kotlin's readLine() function is defined to return a nullable typeString? and returns null on the end of the input, which explicitly forces the developer to handle the case of missing input.

trans-unit.source: Now the main function awaits for the first of them to complete and counts the number of deferred values that are still active. Note that we've used here the fact that select expression is a Kotlin DSL, so we can provide clauses for it using an arbitrary code. In this case we iterate over a list of deferred values to provide onAwait clause for each deferred value.
trans-unit.target: 现在，主要功能等待第一个完成，并计算仍处于活动状态的递延值的数量。请注意，这里我们使用了 select 表达式是Kotlin DSL 的事实，因此我们可以使用任意代码为其提供子句。在这种情况下，我们迭代一系列递延值以为每个递延值提供 onAwait 子句。

trans-unit.source: Objective-C
trans-unit.target: Objective-C

trans-unit.source: Objective-C allows generics to be declared covariant or contravariant. Swift has no support for variance. Generic classes coming from Objective-C can be force-cast as needed.
trans-unit.target: Objective-C 允许声明属变量或反变量。Swift不支持变量。来自Objective-C的泛型类可以根据需要进行强投。

trans-unit.source: Objective-C and Swift use reference counting. Kotlin/Native has its own garbage collection too. Kotlin/Native garbage collection is integrated with Objective-C/Swift reference counting. We do not need to use anything special to control the lifetime of Kotlin/Native instances from Swift or Objective-C.
trans-unit.target: Objective-C和Swift使用引用计数。Kotlin/Native也有自己的垃圾收集。Kotlin/Native的垃圾收集与Objective-C/Swift的引用计数集成在一起。我们不需要使用任何特殊的东西来控制来自Swift或Objective-C的Kotlin/Native实例的寿命。

trans-unit.source: Objective-C classes are imported into Kotlin with their original names. Protocols are imported as interfaces with Protocol name suffix, i.e. @protocol Foo -> interface FooProtocol. These classes and interfaces are placed into a package specified in build configuration (platform.* packages for preconfigured system frameworks).
trans-unit.target: 使用原始名称将Objective-C类导入Kotlin。协议被导入为带有 Protocol 名称后缀的接口，即 @protocol Foo - > interface FooProtocol 。将这些类和接口放入构建配置中指定的程序包（用于预配置系统框架的 platform.* 程序包）中。

trans-unit.source: Objective-C generics do not support all features of either Kotlin or Swift, so there will be some information lost in the translation.
trans-unit.target: Objective-C的泛型并不支持Kotlin或Swift的所有功能,所以在翻译中会丢失一些信息。

trans-unit.source: Objective-C supports "lightweight generics" defined on classes, with a relatively limited feature set. Swift can import generics defined on classes to help provide additional type information to the compiler.
trans-unit.target: Objective-C支持定义在类上的 "轻量级泛型",其功能集相对有限。Swift可以导入定义在类上的泛型,以帮助向编译器提供额外的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: Often C APIs allow passing some user data to callbacks. Such data is usually provided by the user when configuring the callback. It is passed to some C function (or written to the struct) as e.g. void*. However, references to Kotlin objects can't be directly passed to C. So they require wrapping before configuring the callback and then unwrapping in the callback itself, to safely swim from Kotlin to Kotlin through the C world. Such wrapping is possible with StableRef class.
trans-unit.target: C API通常允许将一些用户数据传递给回调。此类数据通常由用户在配置回调时提供。它被传递给某些C函数（或写入结构），例如 void* 。但是，不能将对Kotlin对象的引用直接传递给C。因此，它们需要在配置回调之前进行包装，然后在回调本身中展开，以安全地通过C世界从Kotlin游到Kotlin。使用 StableRef 类可以进行此类包装。

trans-unit.source: On JVM it is possible to redefine global exception handler for all coroutines by registering CoroutineExceptionHandler via ServiceLoader. Global exception handler is similar to Thread.defaultUncaughtExceptionHandler which is used when no more specific handlers are registered. On Android, uncaughtExceptionPreHandler is installed as a global coroutine exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 在JVM上，可以通过 ServiceLoader 注册CoroutineExceptionHandler来为所有协程重新定义全局异常处理程序。全局异常处理程序与 Thread.defaultUncaughtExceptionHandler 相似，在没有其他特定的处理程序注册时使用。在Android上， uncaughtExceptionPreHandler 被安装为全局协程异常处理程序。

trans-unit.source: On the JVM, the array types (Array<Foo>) retain the information about the erased type of their elements, and the type casts to an array type are partially checked: the nullability and actual type arguments of the elements type are still erased. For example, the cast foo as Array<List<String>?> will succeed if foo is an array holding any List<*>, nullable or not.
trans-unit.target: 在JVM上，数组类型（ Array<Foo> ）保留有关其元素的擦除类型的信息，并且部分检查了转换为数组类型的类型：仍会擦除元素类型的可空性和实际类型参数。例如，如果 foo 是一个包含任何 List<*> 的数组，则该铸造 foo as Array<List<String>?> 将成功，无论是否为null。

trans-unit.source: On the Java platform, numbers are physically stored as JVM primitive types, unless we need a nullable number reference (e.g. Int?) or generics are involved. In the latter cases numbers are boxed.
trans-unit.target: 在Java平台上，除非我们需要可为空的数字引用（例如 Int? ）或涉及泛型，否则数字实际上是作为JVM基本类型存储的。在后一种情况下，数字用方框括起来。

trans-unit.source: Once your experimental API graduates and is released in its final state, remove its marker annotation from declarations so that the clients can use it without restriction. However, you should leave the marker classes in modules so that the existing client code remains compatible. To let the API users update their modules accordingly (remove the markers from their code and recompile), mark the annotations as @Deprecated and provide the explanation in its message.
trans-unit.target: 实验性API毕业并以最终状态发布后，请从声明中删除其标记注释，以便客户端可以不受限制地使用它。但是，您应该将标记类留在模块中，以便现有的客户端代码保持兼容。为了让API用户相应地更新其模块（从其代码中删除标记并重新编译），请将注释标记为 @Deprecated ,并在其消息中提供解释。

trans-unit.source: One can think of a coroutine as a light-weight thread. Like threads, coroutines can run in parallel, wait for each other and communicate. The biggest difference is that coroutines are very cheap, almost free: we can create thousands of them, and pay very little in terms of performance. True threads, on the other hand, are expensive to start and keep around. A thousand threads can be a serious challenge for a modern machine.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以把coroutine看作是一个轻量级的线程。和线程一样,coroutine也可以并行运行,互相等待和通信。最大的区别在于,coroutine非常便宜,几乎是免费的:我们可以创建成千上万个coroutine,而且在性能方面付出的代价非常小。另一方面,真正的线程,启动和保持周围的成本很高。一千条线程对于一台现代机器来说是一个严重的挑战。

trans-unit.source: One common use case is storing the values of properties in a map. This comes up often in applications like parsing JSON or doing other “dynamic” things. In this case, you can use the map instance itself as the delegate for a delegated property.

trans-unit.source: One might think that static typing would make it very impractical to make collection classes or any other class that needs to contain members whose types vary with each usage. Generics to the rescue: they allow you to specify a "placeholder" type in a class or function that must be filled in whenever the class or function is used. For example, a node in a linked list needs to contain data of some type that is not known when we write the class, so we introduce a generic type parameterT (they are conventionally given single-letter names):
trans-unit.target: 可能有人认为，静态类型将使制作收集类或需要包含其类型随每次使用而变化的成员的任何其他类变得非常不切实际。通用方法：它们使您可以在类或函数中指定“占位符”类型，每当使用该类或函数时都必须填写该类型。例如，链表中的节点需要包含某种类型的数据，而这些类型的数据在我们编写该类时是未知的，因此我们引入了泛型类型参数 T （它们通常被赋予单字母名称）：

To build a sequence based on a function, call generateSequence() with this function as an argument. Optionally, you can specify the first element as an explicit value or a result of a function call. The sequence generation stops when the provided function returns null. So, the sequence in the example below is infinite.

trans-unit.source: One of the benefits however of coroutines is that when it comes to the developer, writing non-blocking code is essentially the same as writing blocking code. The programming model in itself doesn't really change.
trans-unit.target: 然而coroutines的一个好处是,当对开发者来说,写非阻塞代码和写阻塞代码基本上是一样的。编程模式本身并没有真正改变。

trans-unit.source: One of the key capabilities of Kotlin's multiplatform code is a way for common code to depend on platform-specific declarations. In other languages, this can often be accomplished by building a set of interfaces in the common code and implementing these interfaces in platform-specific modules. However, this approach is not ideal in cases when you have a library on one of the platforms that implements the functionality you need, and you'd like to use the API of this library directly without extra wrappers. Also, it requires common declarations to be expressed as interfaces, which doesn't cover all possible cases.
trans-unit.target: Kotlin多平台代码的关键能力之一是让通用代码依赖于平台专用声明的方式。在其他语言中,通常可以通过在通用代码中构建一组接口,并在平台特定模块中实现这些接口来实现。但是,当你在某个平台上有一个库实现了你所需要的功能,而你想直接使用这个库的API,而不需要额外的包装器时,这种方法并不理想。另外,它要求常用的声明以接口的形式表达,这并不能覆盖所有可能的情况。

trans-unit.source: One of the most common pitfalls in many programming languages, including Java, is that accessing a member of a null reference will result in a null reference exception. In Java this would be the equivalent of a NullPointerException or NPE for short.
trans-unit.target: 许多编程语言（包括Java）中最常见的陷阱之一是，访问空引用的成员将导致空引用异常。在Java中，这相当于 NullPointerException 或NPE的简称。

trans-unit.source: One of the most tricky parts of Java's type system is wildcard types (see Java Generics FAQ). And Kotlin doesn't have any. Instead, it has two other things: declaration-site variance and type projections.
trans-unit.target: Java类型系统中最棘手的部分之一是通配符类型（请参阅Java Generics FAQ）。而且Kotlin没有任何东西。相反，它还有另外两件事：声明站点差异和类型投影。

trans-unit.source: One of the possible use cases of provideDelegate is to check property consistency when the property is created, not only in its getter or setter.
trans-unit.target: provideDelegate 的可能用例之一是在创建属性时检查属性的一致性，而不仅仅是在其getter或setter中。

trans-unit.source: One of the solutions would have been to report each exception separately, but then Deferred.await should have had the same mechanism to avoid behavioural inconsistency and this would cause implementation details of a coroutines (whether it had delegated parts of its work to its children or not) to leak to its exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 解决方案之一是分别报告每个异常，但是Deferred.await应该具有相同的机制来避免行为不一致，这将导致协程的实现细节（无论它是否将工作的一部分委派给了孩子或不）泄漏到其异常处理程序。

trans-unit.source: One other difference between lambda expressions and anonymous functions is the behavior of non-local returns. A return statement without a label always returns from the function declared with the fun keyword. This means that a return inside a lambda expression will return from the enclosing function, whereas a return inside an anonymous function will return from the anonymous function itself.
trans-unit.target: lambda表达式和匿名函数之间的另一个区别是非本地返回的行为。一回没有标签的语句总是从函数返回声明乐趣关键字。这意味着返回 lambda表达式内将从封闭函数返回，而返回一个匿名函数内将从匿名函数本身返回。

trans-unit.source: Our goal is to build a small multiplatform library to demonstrate the ability to share the code between the platforms and its benefits. In order to have a small implementation to focus on the multiplatform machinery, we will write a library which converts raw data (strings and byte arrays) to the Base64 format which can be used on JVM, JS, and any available K/N platform. On JVM implementation will be using java.util.Base64 which is known to be extremely efficient because JVM is aware of this particular class and compiles it in a special way. On JS we will be using the native Buffer API and on Kotlin/Native we will write our own implementation. We will cover this functionality with common tests and then publish the resulting library to Maven.
trans-unit.target: 我们的目标是建立一个小的多平台库，以展示在平台之间共享代码的能力及其好处。为了使小型实现专注于多平台机器，我们将编写一个库，该库将原始数据（字符串和字节数组）转换为Base64格式，可在JVM，JS和任何可用的K / N平台上使用。在JVM上将使用 java.util.Base64 来实现，这是非常有效的，因为JVM知道此特定类并以特殊方式对其进行编译。在JS上，我们将使用本地Buffer API；在Kotlin / Native上，我们将编写自己的实现。我们将通过常规测试介绍此功能，然后将结果库发布到Maven。

trans-unit.source: Our goal of this tutorial is to demonstrate the ability to share code within Kotlin and the benefits it provides. While what we'll be looking at is a simplified application, what is shown here can be applied to real world applications, independent of their size or complexity.
trans-unit.target: 我们本教程的目标是展示在Kotlin中共享代码的能力及其带来的好处。虽然我们将看到的是一个简化的应用程序,但这里所展示的内容可以应用于现实世界中的应用程序,无论其大小或复杂程度如何。

trans-unit.source: Overall, multiplatform is not about compiling all code for all platforms. This model has its obvious limitations, and we understand that modern applications need access to unique features of the platforms they are running on. Kotlin doesn't limit you to the common subset of all APIs in the world. Every component can share as much code as needed with others but can access platform APIs at any time through the expect/actual mechanism provided by the language.
trans-unit.target: 总体而言，多平台并不是要为所有平台编译所有代码。该模型有其明显的局限性，我们了解现代应用程序需要访问其所运行平台的独特功能。Kotlin并不限制您使用世界上所有API的通用子集。每个组件可以与其他组件共享尽可能多的代码，但是可以通过语言提供的 expect / actual 机制随时访问平台API 。

trans-unit.source: Overriding methods always use the same default parameter values as the base method. When overriding a method with default parameter values, the default parameter values must be omitted from the signature:
trans-unit.target: 覆盖方法总是使用与基础方法相同的默认参数值。当覆盖一个有默认参数值的方法时,必须在签名中省略默认参数值。

trans-unit.source: Overriding properties works in a similar way to overriding methods; properties declared on a superclass that are then redeclared on a derived class must be prefaced with override, and they must have a compatible type. Each declared property can be overridden by a property with an initializer or by a property with a getter method.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖属性的工作方式与覆盖方法相似。在超类上声明的属性，然后在派生类上重新声明的属性，必须以override开头，并且它们必须具有兼容的类型。每个声明的属性都可以被带有初始化程序的属性或带有getter方法的属性所覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Package names customarily contain only lowercase letters (no underscores) and the separating dots.
trans-unit.target: 包装名称通常只包含小写字母(没有下划线)和分隔点。

trans-unit.source: Package names customarily correspond to the directory structure - note that the source file name should not be a part of the package name (so if you follow this, file-level symbol names must be unique within an entire directory, not just within a file). However, this correspondence is not required, so if you're going to do interop with Java code and all your package names must start with the same prefix, e.g. org.khanacademy, you might be relieved to learn that you don't need to put all your code inside org/khanacademy (which is what Java would have forced you to do) - instead, you could start out with a directory called e.g. content, and the files inside it could declare that they belong to the package org.khanacademy.content. However, if you have a mixed project with both Kotlin and Java code, the convention is to use the Java-style package directories for Kotlin code too.
trans-unit.target: 包名称通常与目录结构相对应-请注意，源文件名不应该是包名称的一部分（因此，如果您遵循此名称，则文件级符号名在整个目录中必须唯一，而不仅仅是在文件中） 。但是，这种对应关系不是必需的，因此，如果您要与Java代码进行互操作，并且所有包名称都必须以相同的前缀开头，例如 org.khanacademy ，您可能会发现不需要将您的所有代码放入 org/khanacademy （这是Java会强迫您执行的操作）-相反，您可以从一个名为eg content 的目录开始，并且其中的文件可以声明它们属于该包 org.khanacademy.content 。但是，如果您有一个同时包含Kotlin和Java代码的项目，那么约定也是将Java样式的软件包目录也用于Kotlin代码。

trans-unit.source: Polymorphism
trans-unit.target: Polymorphism

trans-unit.source: Polymorphism is the ability to treat objects with similar traits in a common way. In Python, this is achieved via ducktyping: if x refers to some object, you can call x.quack() as long as the object happens to have the function quack() - nothing else needs to be known (or rather, assumed) about the object. That's very flexible, but also risky: if x is a parameter, every caller of your function must be aware that the object they pass to it must have quack(), and if someone gets it wrong, the program blows up at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 多态是一种以通用方式处理具有相似特征的对象的能力。在Python中，这是通过鸭子输入来实现的：如果 x 指向某个对象，则只要该对象碰巧具有函数 quack() ，就可以调用 x.quack() ，不需要知道其他任何东西（或更确切地说，假设是）关于对象。这非常灵活，但是也很冒险：如果 x 是一个参数，则函数的每个调用者都必须意识到，传递给它的对象必须具有 quack() ，如果有人弄错了，则程序在运行时会崩溃。
